mapper.sql: ID, ONLINE_TITLE, ONLINE_DETAIL, ONLINE_STATE, OP_ID, ONLINE_TIME, PRODUCT_ID, SUBJECT_TYPE
mapper.insert: insert into ONL_ONLINE (ID, ONLINE_TITLE, ONLINE_DETAIL, ONLINE_STATE, OP_ID, ONLINE_TIME, PRODUCT_ID, SUBJECT_TYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{onlineTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlineDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlineState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subjectType,jdbcType=TINYINT})

ONLINE_TITLE,

mapper.update:
update ONL_ONLINE
ONLINE_TITLE = #{onlineTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONLINE_DETAIL = #{onlineDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ONLINE_STATE = #{onlineState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
OP_ID = #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ONLINE_TIME = #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SUBJECT_TYPE = #{subjectType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ONL_ONLINE set ONLINE_TITLE = #{onlineTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ONLINE_DETAIL = #{onlineDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ONLINE_STATE = #{onlineState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, OP_ID = #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ONLINE_TIME = #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SUBJECT_TYPE = #{subjectType,jdbcType=TINYINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, ONLINE_TITLE, ONLINE_DETAIL, ONLINE_STATE, OP_ID, ONLINE_TIME, PRODUCT_ID, SUBJECT_TYPE from ONL_ONLINE

SELECT oo.ID, oo.ONLINE_TITLE, oopc.PIC_PATH, oos.ONLINE_SPEC, oos.SALE_PRICE, oos.CASHBACK_AMOUNT, oos.ID AS SPEC_ID, oo.ONLINE_DETAIL FROM ONL_ONLINE oo LEFT JOIN ONL_ONLINE_SPEC oos ON oos.ID = ( SELECT MIN(ID) FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC WHERE SALE_PRICE=(SELECT min(SALE_PRICE) FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC WHERE ONLINE_ID=oo.ID) AND SEQ_NO=(SELECT MIN(oos.SEQ_NO) FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC oos WHERE oos.ONLINE_ID = oo.ID) ) LEFT JOIN ONL_ONLINE_PIC oopc ON oo.ID=oopc.ONLINE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND oo.ID IN ( SELECT ONLINE_ID FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC WHERE SALE_PRICE=(SELECT min(SALE_PRICE) FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC WHERE ONLINE_ID = oo.ID) AND SEQ_NO=(SELECT MIN(oos.SEQ_NO) FROM ONL_ONLINE_SPEC oos WHERE oos.ONLINE_ID = oo.ID) ) AND oo.ONLINE_STATE=1 AND oopc.PIC_TYPE=1 AND oo.ID=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ONL_ONLINE WHERE PRODUCE_ID=#{produceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ONLINE_STATE=1
